title: Mercury Transit in the 11th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Mercury transiting the 11th house sharpens thinking around goals, income, networks, and long-term planning. This phase supports gains through communication, negotiations, and idea-driven collaboration. Social circles become active, bringing exchanges that help refine objectives and unlock opportunities. Analytical skills aid in converting plans into measurable outcomes, though overdiscussion or shifting priorities can slow momentum. When ideas are communicated with clarity and follow-through, this transit supports steady progress toward ambitions and practical gains.
closing: Mercury in the 11th house rewards clear thinking and purposeful communication. Focused ideas transform networks into tangible gains.
